about_the_game:
Dive into a feel-good adventure of love, laughter, and cat companionship. Add My Fair Cat: Snow to your Steam wishlist and start spreading a little happiness today!


Synopsis

Recently moving to a new high school and not knowing anyone could have made for a dull routine, but everything changes when you save a stray cat. This single act of kindness sparks a chain of adventures that add a whole new layer of excitement in your daily life.

As you're figuring out how to keep your new kitty content and purring, you'll unexpectedly bump into Nathan — a handsome student with a surprisingly deep connection to cats.
As it turns out, making a little feline friend happy opens doors to all sorts of unexpected happiness, showing that the best parts of life often come from looking after someone else, whether they're covered in fur or not.

Key Features

  • Heartwarming Cat Rescue: Embark on a journey that starts with the simple act of rescuing a cat and unfolds into a tale of joy and challenges to make your new friend purr with happiness.
  • Feel-Good Romance: Find laughter, blushes and butterflies in your interactions with Nathan, your popular classmate whose path crosses yours in the most unexpected ways, thanks to your furry companion.
  • Quirky Life Adventures: From dealing with cat caring to navigating the ups and downs of daily life, discover a story filled with relatable moments, friendship, and the pursuit of happiness for you and your cat - it's all about those little moments and connections that make everything feel just right.
  • Charming Visuals: Immerse yourself in a cute art style that is all about the cozy, cat-filled moments and the casual scenes of daily life.

For anyone who has ever smiled at the thought of making a cat's day, My Fair Cat: Snow is your next must-play! It's a game that celebrates the bond between humans and animals, the unexpected turns in the road to romance, and the delight in making a small corner of the world better for someone else—furry or otherwise!

legal_notice:
My Fair Cat: Snow is a game created and provided by Golden Castle Studio.

This program contains free software under a number of licenses, including the MIT License and GNU Lesser General Public License.
name: My Fair Cat: Snow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA 600 Series, AMD 7000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a feel-good adventure of love, laughter, and cat companionship. For anyone who has ever smiled at the thought of making a cat's day!
supported_languages: English, French, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
